long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is it?
A free and easy to use trade mark searching tool.

Why use it?
Whether you're a startup or well established business that needs to check for a new business name or product names, TMchecks makes it super easy to search for existing trade marks with just a few mouse clicks (no re-typing necessary).

How does it work?
⦿ TMchecks is a free online tool designed for ease of use and comes with everything you need for a simple and easy search.
⦿ TMchecks enables you to save time by automatically saving your prior searches. 
⦿ Easily share with your team, colleagues or customers (if you’re a design agency).  
⦿ It's simple to use. Allows for users to search for a trade mark from text on web pages.

With TMchecks, you highlight a word or a group of words on the web page and with one click, and find out instantly if those word(s) have been trade marked by someone else. If they are trade marked, quickly move on to your next choice of word(s).

Who can use TMchecks?
TMchecks is trusted by thousands of users across more than 100 companies. 
⦿ Small business owners.
⦿ Aspiring eCommerce entrepreneurs.
⦿ Engineers, developers, scientists. 
⦿ Marketers and designers. 
Anyone that wants peace of mind that the word(s) they want to use are not likely to infringe another’s trade marks.

How can TMchecks help me?
⦿ Spend less time than it would using traditional trade mark searching and clearance searches. 
⦿ Reduce back-and-forth typing, copying and pasting text and searching for trade marks the old way. 
⦿ Enables you to focus your time on building your business.

TMchecks in the news
"Why copy and paste from one site to another or re-type words for trade mark searching, when one second to highlight and click can provide you with the clarity and confidence to choose your brand words for your product or service? ... now is the time for TMchecks" – BusinessInsider

"It fills this gap between copying, pasting or re-typing words and taking the time to have a meeting with a trade mark attorney ... it’s rare to have something that’s low friction and high impact, while also accelerating de-risking essential business steps." – Forbes
